ActJudges Act
SubjectLorna S. Hamilton ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Alvin C. Hamilton **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to LORNA S. HAMILTON, survivor of the Hon. Alvin C. Hamilton, an Associate Chief Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench for Manitoba (Family Division), effective July 26, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
